name: Growth (Will Rhodes, Varun Saxena)
description:
GROWTH is a short walk through a strange place. Originally inspired by Corbusier's Museum of Unlimited Growth, we took the initial modular premise and exploded the layout into a serpentine maze. From there, an ambiguous premise unfolds, as modules rise from the ocean towards a looming sphere hanging low in the dim haze.

- Will Rhodes and Varun Saxena, May 2021

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Esc - Pause

TIPS

You may, at some point, find yourself at a dead end. Throw yourself into the ocean to revive at the center of the structure if you don't want to back track.

Map-

Critical Path-
